description: This table contains the Edit History Information for all Notes (HNO records). Shows information about the type of edit, when the note was edited, and the user who made the edit.

columns.name: NOTE_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number identifier for this note contact.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of data, within the note contact.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The Note ID, or General Use Notes (HNO) record number.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date (calendar format) on which the encounter took place.

columns.name: EDIT_HX_INSTANT
columns.description: The instant at which the History Edit Action was performed.

columns.name: EDIT_HX_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The edit action that was performed on the note.  Examples include Activate, Inactivate, and Edit.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Activate


Inactivate


Edit


Create

columns.name: EDIT_HX_INFO
columns.description: This item can contain additional general edit information about the edit.
